review: I visited Dr.Sunil for lower back , knee and ankle pain. Doctor listened patiently and advised medications and physio only with blood tests, avoiding multiple scans. He answered all my queries with a smile. Would highly recommend him for any joint related issues.

Doctor seems to be good, but his staff and appointment management is pathetic. They do not honour any appointment even booked via call or practo. Even after an appointment, its first come first serve basis and a minimum waiting time of 2 hours to see the doctor and another hour to get your diagnostic reports checked via the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Sunil is very good doctor. He is very intelligent and experienced doctor.
My spouse had a knee pain, he understood the problem at the very first visit. And treated with right diagnosis.
He also operated my mother who had fell down. 

Very good doctor and I recommend based on my experience...

Amol

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met the doctor on 2nd September, 2023 to consult him for my mother's knee pain related issue.First, I had to wait for more than 1.5 hours even when I had taken an appointment and I reached on time. It would still have been fine if he was seeing patients. The problem was it was unknown to the hospital staff where the doctor was and when the staff was calling him he was just asking them to tell the patients to wait.Second, which is a more annoying thing, was that he saw my mother in the procedure room where there were other patients already present. It also seemed that he was not interested in listening to all the complainants rather was in a hurry to explain his diagnosis based on the first complaint that my mother told.Overall, my experience was really bad and I can't recommend him to anyone.

We went on time as per the available appointment slot (5.40) only to be told that the doctor would not come before 6.30. To top it, the receptionist blamed us for making an appointment without checking with the doctor!!! We asked for the number, she obviously denied. After confirming the appointment, we tried to call the clinic thrice with no response. 

Maybe Dr Kini is good, we'll never know. The overall atmosphere at his clinic has put us off.  The receptionist yelled and was extremely rude. No way to treat a patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** **** ****** ** ******** ** ********  ********** My father was suffering from ankle & shoulder stiffness due to which he was not able to walk properly. Dr. asked to get ultrasound & xray *** ***** ** *** *** **** ** **** *** **** ****** He just asked to take vitamin tablets which did not improve the condition **** * ** ********* *** **** ******  ***** * ****** *** ** ****** ** *** **** ** **** ******* *** ******** **** ******** ******* ****** ** ** ********* **** ****** ********* Dr. Sunil Kini did not spent any time to listen to the patient. ** **** ******* *** ******* *** **** ***** **** ********** Will not at all recommend this doctor to anyone.

Really bad experience with the staff and the doctor. Very arrogant doctor, late by 2 hours for an appointment fixed days back. 5 patients incl. me walked out of the clinic,looking at his and his staff misbehaviour with patients. Would never visit this place again!

Sunil is * **** ************* ****** *** an expert orthopedist. I am currently in treatment for a knee joint dislocation and mpfl ligament tear. 

He is very attentive and listen to patient's problems. I strongly recommend him for your all sort of orthopaedic issues.

I have visited Dr Sunil today. He patiently heard my problems and explained the reason for the pain and it's root cause. He also suggested the effective plan to treat the ailment.

** ** **** ************* *** his positive vibes really helps a patient to think that he is already in process of getting cured.

I would very strongly recommend Dr Sunil.

Thanks a lot Dr Sunil.

A very nice and soft spoken doctor. Very knowledgeable and listens to your problems carefully before diagnosis. He also explains to the patient the complete treatment plan and reasons why ailment is happening very clearly. His way of connecting with a patient definitely gives huge confidence and comfort necessary for recovery.

review: I am very satisfied with treatment from Dr.Sunil Kini. His friendly approach and thorough explanation in layman terms of the issue is hugely reassuring. Moreover he gave his personal phone number and readily helped me over phone which was very helpful. Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** **** **** ************** My mother was complaining of leg pain and he diagnosed as skip disc which we didn’t even imagine. Very quick diagnosis. He didn’t expect me to visit again. He just asked me to send the reports online. Saved me a visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I always have very positive experience with Dr. Sunil G.Kini. Dr. Kini is gentle and nice person and of course so professional. The Dr. is friendly and always reply back over the phone too, for any pain related issues or any other health queries. Dr. Kini’s diagnosis is extremely good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had done knee replacement for our father 6 months ago and this was a follow up check up
The operation was very well done and the recovery had been very good
Doctor was always friendly and patient in answering all queries
Would recommend the doctor

The clinic has to be maintained in a more hygienic condition. Hair strands everywhere, the seats aren't cleaned well so steps have to be taken to tidy up. A more organized set up is necessary as patients and staffs are simply walking around continuously. This time the waiting time was more.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very friendly and helped me with a thorough explanation of the diagnosis. He cleared all the doubts I had and answered even my silliest questions. I was very happy with the overall consultation and would recommend him strongly. Thank you!

Doctor is very friendly.. He made me comfortable, explained the problem in detail.. Explained the recovery process and things I needed to do in a manner that could be easily practiced.. And most importantly gave me his card and personal no. If I wanted to get back on anything.. Whole experience was awesome..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It was first time. It's good to see Doctor start with basic treatment first to understand the problem. No test in first appointment. He explained the reason for problem and suggested other probable reason for issue. He suggest some to do solutions by patient. Will see him again in 4 daysfor next level treatment.

The Mak specialist center has to increase follow up time for 7 days instead of 4 days as for any treatment except cold and fever 4 days is not enough time for follow up. 

Regards, 
Mihir Shah

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

******** ************ Explained the problem clearly.. very polite and wam behaviour.. Will recommend  👌

I visited for back pain issue but my pain was not that much worse. Doctor listened carefully he asked me few questions then he explained me what is the issue. He didn’t ask me for any report. He suggested me 4 medicines and one gel.
Now I am not facing any issue. Submitted this feedback after 2 months.

He is a very able doctor who patiently listens to the issues and remembers them during the subsequent visits too. *** ********* ** *********** *** ********* *** he did not ask for unnecessary tests. He  explained the problem and the cause for it not in a hurry as most doctors seem to be in today; which assures the patient tremendously. 

The MAK clinic itself is another story. They could be better organised in terms of giving appointments and avoiding rescheduling. Overall good experience.

Very good. He is highly qualified and has achieved rich experience in his area at a very young age and has worked in various geographies. He is a thorough professional and gets at the root of the problem in a short time and does not waste time on irrelevant facts and unnecessary procedures.

Dr. Sunil was very attentive, he understood the problem I was facing. He performed only the required tests and suggested further steps to be taken.
Throughout he made me relaxed and always gave me all the medical options and information. He took a lot of time to understand and explain and didn't rush at all.

Definitely recommended.
Dr Sunil is really humble and talk to the point. Great Doctor and worth visiting. You will not be disappointed
Great doctor intelligent focused responsive have been there for my bro in law and myself. Very good deduction and resolution

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
1) Poor reception and crowd management
2) Dr. Not on time. 
3) Dr. in hurry and didn't really answer,. IT was kind of RUSH situation. 
This is absolutely NOT ok
** *** ****** *** ** ******** *** *** ********* ** ********** *** ******
5) Dr. wasn't ready to listen
6) had to wait for 1 Hour.
7) Demands rashly to pay the fee affront.
reply_text: Clearly reflects on you as a person who judges doctors and clinic as a pass time .Your appointment was at 5pm and I have seen you at 5.10pm.proper Diagnosis is not spending hours to talk to you about your personal life and general chat which many doctors do.If you need to diagnose a condition one should have a thorough knowledge and usually 10leading questions are enough.Asking you to pay consultation is not rude….it’s your duty to pay.Please stop peddling lies.It doesn’t affect us but reflects very bad on you.

review: Doctor was good but overall good experience is not great. The wait time is painfully high and there is no appointment procedure  followed if u take appointment u still have to wait for more than 30 -45 mins to be attended. Xray is next door but it still a long line there too. I would refrain coming here .

My son broke his humerus bone while playing. Doctor operated and had to put 3 k-wires to hold the broken bones. My son has not complained about pain anytime after surgery. 7 weeks are over and k-wires are removed. Everything looks good. Thanks Dr. Kini.

No real benifit of booking time slot through Practo.. Doctor was friendly, but didnt had any closing remarks.. Other than referring to other diagnostic centers..Receptionist said that we can only come 4 days from the date of payment..which is 500 rs.. We are paying for the consultation of ailment..and test n everything should be taken into account.. So 500rs should aid the final consultation after all test..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have pain Wrist. Then initially i went to ******** **** hosp and met doctor. no change in pain reduce at all. i have changed many doctors about my wrist pain. But finally i got chance to meet Dr Sunil Sir. ** ** *** ***** every doctor has suggested operation for my pain. but dr sunil suggested dont go for operation we will use medicine. with in one week believe it or not pain reduced to 90 per and i always suggest doctor sunil only.. thanks doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Thanks

Friendly doctor, who listens to concerns fully and suggests remedy. This is my first visit and doctor made me at ease with his kind words. My treatment has started and hoping to see a complete recovery.

Very Good. His diagnosis (I had abscess in my arm which required incision and drainage) was spot on. He heard my concerns patiently and even took my calls outside of his hrs at Manipal Hospital. I would definitely recommend Dr. Kini
Doctor Sunil G Kini , identified my problem in the first appointment only.Now my problem is solved..

We went to visit Dr Kini for my 10 year old daughter who was complaining of knee pain. The doctor was patient and listened to her issue and suggested that we start of with physiotherapy. After 4 days of therapy my daughter feels a lot of relief in pain. She has 3 more weeks of therapy and I'm hoping she would recover completely. I'm glad he didn't prescribe medication since I did not want her to have any medicine unless necessary. I'm happy so far with the treatment

I know doctor past two years and in this commercial world ,first time i have met a doctor who do justice with his profession..he does lots of social work..somedays he do free consultation n I remember there were patient came for some test which was costly n he was unable to do then doctor went ahead and paid the complete bill in behalf of the patient..hats off to you..* ********* **** ** ** ************ ********* ** ** ******* * ** **** **** *** **** **********

review: Iam happy dr is friendly dr given good suggestions and naw iam fine thank you sir and all staff also very helpful 😀

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dr. did a great job with our first ever health exam at their clinic. He explained everything to us in a very clear manner.He was also kind and friendly. the staff was helpful.
One hour 15 minutes waiting time on both occasions. I have spent 40k just on reports and medicines without any diagnosis…and have been asked to do some more. Not convincing.
reply_text:
Pls stop peddling lies and half truths.There are certain pain conditions which need detailed evaluation with tests and scans because there is a lot of overlay between ORTHOPEDICS and rheumatology.Diagnosis in medicine may not be always be absolute and can be vague sometimes. So please be patient and allow us to do our best.Pls reveal your identity as we are not able to track you.

As per the waiting time being long, since we are in busy surgical field attending complicated cases in a tertiary centre, adhering strictly to time may not always be possible.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,

review: The patient could not move out of the vehicle because of foot injury so the doctor came out of his chamber to inspect patient on spot. He took personal interest to help patient to go upto x-ray room and after that started treatment immediately.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: My father has undergone the leg in-plants (flapping) plus plastic surgery , but its again getting pain and swelling , when we visit 2nd time, he is asking us to go for one more round of surgery ** ****** ***** ********
reply_text: Pls reveal your identity and details as we are unable to retrieve your data.The success of flap uptake is by the plastic surgeon and I have no role to play…I have done justice to my role by removing the implants successfully to control the infection.
